bidding

Class Bill

  • java.lang.Object
    • bidding.Bill

  • public final class Bill
extends java.lang.Object
    Class: Bill Represents a bill that a the Auction Central Staff will use to pay for a charge a bidder for the item they win in the auction. TCSS 360 - Software Development and Quality Assurance University of Washington, Tacoma Winter 2014 Instructor: Dr. Adwoa Donyina
    Version:
    1.0 Winter 2014
    Author:
    Casey Morrison
